hackathonProjects.name: winSOL
hackathonProjects.description: Deposit in winSOL's no-loss stake pool for a chance to win SOL each week from validator staking rewards
hackathonProjects.additionalInformation:
winSol uses the audited Solana Labs Stake Pool program to protect and stake player's funds and collect rewards from validators.
Each week a draw is run, by taking a list of winSOL holders, giving each a 'ticket' for every winSol lamport they own, then picking 110 random winners. winSOL holders who also own a 'Vault Hunter' NFT will get additional chances to win, adding an extra element of gamification.
Since all winnings are generated from staking, there is never any loss to a staker's principal - they can always withdraw as much SOL as they deposited.
1 winSOL === 1 SOL.
There are multiple repositories in our github, some private, which concern the public site, the script to pick winners, the bot that generated our AI art, and our tweaks to the reference stake pool. Access has been granted to the private repos.
Links:
https://winsol.io/tease - landing page
https://winsol.io/nfts - NFT collection
https://winsol.io/docs/roadmap - Roadmap

Thanks for your consideration!

hackathonProjects.name: Aimdrop
hackathonProjects.description: On-chain based wallet analysis solution for web3 marketing with Semi-Fungible Token, especially targeting for web3 game projects
hackathonProjects.additionalInformation: https://aimdrop.vercel.app/ (Note: api is not working for vercel, so you can't get wallet lists, so please test within local environment to distribute SFTs) Aimdrop is an on-chain based wallet analysis solution for web3 marketing with Semi-Fungible Token, especially targeting web3 game projects. Aimdrop consists of two main functionalities. First, you can make Semi-Fungible Token which is defined as Fungible Asset Standard by Metaplex easier than before without coding, which can be used as in-game assets like game items. Second, you can distribute these items(SFT) to curated potential users(wallets) which are collected by on-chain analysis. Aimdrop can accelerate game projects/marketers to promote their projects much effciently. Also, Game projects can use Aimdrop as a web3.0 marketing funnel. We're aiming to innovate web3.0 Game marketing sector by providing necessary tools to find and engage potential users. Let's Aimdrop!

hackathonProjects.name: Propcandle Solana Club - PSC
hackathonProjects.description:
PROP-CANDLE
Our PROPCANDLE are NFTs that guarantee their ownership and trading reward, and a way to invest in a low-cost, diversified collective fund, as the holder can sell their NFT whenever they want, this is to explore the potential of the Cryptocurrency markets , NFTs, Metaverse, Blockchain Games and many others collectively*
How it works?
We will launch NFT Collection, based on the movement of the crypto market, that is, each candle of each Altcoin will be analyzed and transformed into an NFT, with important data. Our purpose is to bring the history of Altcoin as it fluctuates in a dynamic and fun way.
Trade to Earn — T2E
All proceeds will be directed to a fund managed by professionals in the Trader market.
The fund's profit will be returned to the holders on a monthly basis, and the announcement of each POOL's profit will be released every Sunday at the opening of the Asian trading session, via Twitter.
From the reward:
50% — Traders
45% — PROPCANDLE Owners
5% — Fees
We are developing a Twich channel to make future trades transparent so holders can view Traders performance live.*
our responsibility
As an investor in an unprecedented revolution, we stand for strong decentralized governance and sustainable business practices that result in value creation, protection and profit for our clients.

hackathonProjects.name: Effective Finance
hackathonProjects.description: We created a platform to make USDC donations more effective, transparent and contingent to certain environmental conditions happening or not. hackathonProjects.name: FlokiCyberPunk
hackathonProjects.description: A game in which users play their NFTs against each other and earn tokens
hackathonProjects.additionalInformation:
Please include a description of why you built your project, how it was built, testing instructions, a project demo/walkthrough, and a list of team members that contributed (if applicable). We thought that there are a huge number of NFTs and users need to do something with them, as an option to play with them! Then we started making a game in which any user can connect his wallet and play with his NFTs that he has on his wallet. Then we started looking for options on how to integrate all this with Unity, but there were no ready-made templates. But we managed to integrate everything, everything works perfectly. All you need is a Phantom wallet and any NFT on it. Next, we made the interface in the game. For the user to choose the NFT that he will play right in the game. A little later we will make multiplayer and users will be able to play against each other. We really want millions to play our game, the game is simple, but interesting! We need either some funding or some marketing help. I would really like our project to be noticed at the hackathon. After all, we have really done a lot of work and there is already an implementation of Unity - Phantom, and already users can even play. We have a small team of a few people - we do everything ourselves. Here is our programmer's github https://github.com/onlineocean/FCP/commits?author=Alexei-Grigarovich I would love to participate and win!
Test game https://fcp.flokicyberpunk.com/

hackathonProjects.name: Boync Auctions
hackathonProjects.description: Penny Auctions Platform for Solana NFTs
hackathonProjects.additionalInformation:
The platform aims to offer a low entry point to auction Solana NFTs.
Penny auctions offer a feeling of competition more highlighted than traditional auctions.
Users can bid with as little as 1 BOYNC token.
How it works:
Each time a user bids (burns) 1 BOYNC token, the auction timer is increased by 1 minute and bidder is remembered as being on top of bidders stack. After all involved bidders have exhauste all their BOYNC tokens, and timer runs out, the bidder to place the last BOYNC token is picked as winner.

hackathonProjects.name: Wooy
hackathonProjects.description: Wooy is the first Web3 platform where users can win incredible prizes and once in a lifetime experiences, while they donate to important causes.
hackathonProjects.additionalInformation:
## Inspiration
We created Wooy as a result of our previous experience working with NGOs and our love for technology. We don't say that they have a problem that has to be solved, because every donation or contribution is positive. But we do believe that with the correct use of technology and an excellent team we can create modern solutions that generate for example, a great increase in the number of donations or generate an action that makes the cause known to millions of people. Or why NOT, even reward those people who donate, trying to make a change in the world.
Our objective is to help Nonprofits and causes all around the world. We not only want to help fund causes, but also want to help raise awareness for them and get people to know what’s happening, how they can help and how their donations are helping change the life of others. We want to help these causes get funded in the long ran and for that they need a way to get the people to know them and what they are doing. ## Impact
We don’t want to be just another web that has a checkout option to donate, there are already lot’s of companies who provide that service and that do it very well. What we want to do is to really make the “pie” bigger, we believe that we incentivize donations in a very rewarding way and that we can disrupt an industry by doing something totally different to what is being done today. We provide the technology, marketing and collecting effort for NGOs while allowing them to focus on doing more and better impact!
Join us in the journey of creating a new generation of donor!
## What it does
We created a **lossless participation model** where just by depositing you are already participating, without losing or risking your tokens. Users tokens generate interest in well-known crypto protocols, such as Aave or Compound and they only use this interest to participate, that’s why we like to say it’s “free”!
**Basically, we have created a no-brainer model based on three main pillars where users can:**
- Win unique prizes.
- Withdraw whenever you want, we are non-custodial.
- Generate donations with their funds in an intelligent way.
For every prize we will partner with an NGO, aligned with the SDGs, to whom we will help raise funds and will allow users to vote on which one they want to donate.
We will have all kinds of prizes, from unique trips to experiences with celebrities. By working with celebrities we can talk directly to their fan base and onboard those fans to crypto in an easy and rewarding way.
Just imagine having the opportunity to go to part of the Rolling Stones tour, where you travel with the band, go to see the concert from exclusive places and experience all from the inside. Imagine how many people will give everything to have this once in a lifetime experience… these millions of users you are imagining are the users we will help onboard on crypto and create a new generation of donors.
## Accomplishments that we're proud of
We did an MVP off-chain in Argentina in partnership with the Red Cross. Where we worked with 9 important celebrities. Our business model generates viral content organically and that's how the MVP managed to raise more than 3 thousand users in ~3 months without any marketing budget whatsoever. We also had great media coverage in important channels like newspapers and tv.
## What we learned
During this MVP we realized that we had two main problems that come from using traditional web2 concepts. The first is transparency and the second was friction with the users.
What we realized is that when working with donations its very important the trust of the users. One of the things we were getting asked is how can they be sure that the donation to the RedCross was really made. That is one of the main reasons why we started thinking that blockchain was an excellent solution to give transparency and traceability to our model, allowing users to audit what is being made and where their donations are going.
Another thing we started to realize is that we were interacting with the users with a model that is very inefficient and full of frictions, the lottery tickets. Basically users bought tickets with their interaction and those tickets were the chances they had to win on the sweepstake. This model has, between other problems, the issue that when a users participates one, two or three times without winning they will stop participating and how can the user trust that the draw was made without compromise. That’s when we started thinking of different ways of evolving this outdated participation method and started thinking on blockchain/crypto solutions to eliminate the frictions with the users. This led to our actual model where we have a lossless participation method, being “free” for the users to participate and we use technologies like Chainlink VRF to determinate the winners, allowing us to eliminate the frictions with the users, improving their lifetime value and decreasing the churn.
## B2B opportunity
During our MVP we were approach by companies who wanted to participate in our content. Basically we are connecting celebrities, nonprofits and fans sharing incredible experiences, this creates highly viralizable content where they can promote their brands, generating awareness and encouraging sustainability causes.
We created a tool for businesses where they can get different kinds of benefits without doing nothing more. Most companies have an anual budget that they donate to nonprofits in order to improve their ESG performance. What we allow them is to make the same donation but get two extra benefits by doing it with us. The first one is that they can participate as sponsors in our prizes getting marketing campaigns without having to invest more and the second is that we allow them to deposit those funds and donate the original donation budget + the yield generated. Its really a no-brainer for them, they don’t spend more money, they get highly viralizable marketing campaigns and can get more tax benefits from their donations.’
Additionally, this is very useful for companies because consumers make them more and more responsible for their environmental impact.
## What's next for WOOY
- **Soulbound tokens as Proof of Donation PODs:** We want to create the concept of POD, giving a purposeful use to NFTs. This works as an excellent tool for people to track their donations and impact; with the PODs, we register all the transaction information in the metadata such as who donated, when, how much, and to whom. Being able to record and allow users to see the transaction from “user to use” adding transparency to donations. Also, people having an NFT have a constant remainder of the causes they been helping and show others what causes they could also help.
Another additional benefit for all this is that users can get donation receipts and have tax deductions for the donations they made around the year. This is not only useful for the users, but also useful for companies who sponsor our prizes while making marketing campaigns and improving their ESG performance. By making our PODs a soulbound token we can use them as badges for users to show the causes they are supporting and as a way or really tracking who are making the donations. Allowing us to strengthen our community and give them additionally benefits along the way, such us voting in which nonprofits they want to help next, which types of prizes they want or doing airdrops from partners.
- **Being Cross Chain**: We believe that the future is cross chain, and that blockchains need to be connected in order to improve the user experience and the ease of adoption. This is why we want users to be able to stake on the main blockchains and the main tokens. We want to be able to speak to those who are hodling tokens and give them a purpose use for them. No matter what token the user has and in which network, they will be able to participate without having to swap them and we will do it so users can have a place where they can hodl while having the chance to win incredible experience and helping nonprofits.
- **Fiat users adoption**: Creating once in a lifetime experiences with celebrities allows us to have an excellent tool to onboard the next hundred million users into crypto. By working with them we can talk directly to their fan base and onboard those fans into crypto in an easy and rewarding way. We will have the onramps and education for these users and help them on their first steps on crypto so they can start having financial freedom and in this way help towards financial inclusion.
- **Charitable tax-deductions:** By working with donations for nonprofits we will give the tax-deduction benefits to our users. This is a very important concept that opens the game to B2B services.
### How we plan to continue
For our go-to market strategy we are planning a couple of MVP test first and then raising a funding round to make a full launch.
We are starting partnership with different companies to create the first couple of prizes and make the first tests with their communities. This allows us to continue validating our model and start leveraging on other communities to jump start our own. From there we plan on making the first experiences with Argentinian/Latam crypto users for our first season. For our second season start targeting users and prizes for the US crypto community. For our third season, after testing with crypto users, we plan on start focusing in fiat users to onboard them into Wooy.
# Solana
We haven’t started the development of the smart contracts but with funding we could start building. We have all the business and partnerships side already created and the first version of our UX/UI.
[https://xd.adobe.com/view/f33ec559-d884-4da1-b4db-71e20b256398-a66d/](https://xd.adobe.com/view/f33ec559-d884-4da1-b4db-71e20b256398-a66d/)

hackathonProjects.name: Maki - Vending Experiences
hackathonProjects.description: Maki provides vending machine experiences powered by Solana Pay for user acquisition, token gated purchases and discounts, and a turn-key approach for small businesses seeking to accept crypto in exchange for their goods/services.
hackathonProjects.additionalInformation:
www.maki.market
The idea for Maki was born on August 2nd when I bought a ~really old (circa 1980's)~ vending machine from an office closing down in Silicon Valley.
Knowing nothing about vending machines, and little about hardware, I embarked on converting this vending machine from accepting analog to digital, touch-less payment methods. On the software side, we are leveraging existing Solana POS APIs and Solana Pay compatible technologies to power payments via a mobile application.
In a matter of days, I was getting electronic components shipped to my garage and learning about new protocols that I'd use to communicate between my mobile interface and the vending machine.
Just 14 days later, I've come to agreements with 2 spaces in San Francisco that will be adopting Maki machines: the "Founders Inc" office permanently (in a few days), and "Atlas Cafe" for one-off events (ie. Trilema Solana multi-chain event on 8/30).
I am working on a third agreement to deploy Maki machines at up to 3 locations in partnership with Launch House. The first of these three Launch House machines will be deployed at Launch House's Kick Off Event and NEW house in San Francisco - in early September.
In short, this passion project has quickly grown into an agency that will launch vending experiences that can onboard new consumers and businesses, as well as engage existing web3 natives in projects they're already a part of.

hackathonProjects.name: Ticketland
hackathonProjects.description:
Ticketland is a ticketing platform and infrastructure. It provides the same web2 UX within the context of web3.
Some of the features that differentiate Ticketland from existing web3 solutions:
1. Safe Custodian wallet: Users can simply sign up using web2 type of solutions. No need to download any crypto wallet browser extentions. Use the same credentials to access your wallet both on mobile and web. No private key or mnemonic imports.
2. Secondary market: A combination of p2p and AMM on-chain market that ticket holders can use shall they decide to sell their tickets. The program will make sure that tickets are not re-sold at an over-inflated price. 3. No more over bookings: On-chain programs will make sure that no two same tickets are sold more than once. This allows for safe on-chain affiliate programs to be used in a ticket sale. 4. Multiple ticket types: You can select multiple ticket types for one event each having a different sale type. Optionally, each ticket can have a unique name which you can choose.
5. Multiple sale types: We support various sale type including free, fixed price, whitelist, refundable and some other exotic ones such as dutch auctions, refundable dutch auctions, blinded auctions etc.
6. Native coin airdrop: Each custodian wallet that is created upon user signing up with Ticketland, will have enough native coins to pay the transaction cost of the first few blockchain transactions.
7. On-chain affiliate program: Event organizers can choose partners that will promote the ticket sale of their event. The process will be driven by on-chain programs.
8. On-chain metadata: Each NFT will have off-chain and on-chain dynamic metadata. e.g. has user attended the given event? Metadata are part of your ticket history.
9. Tickets are SAFU: Tickets are non-transferable NFTs which means that even if one steals user's wallet, he would still be unable to prove he is is the original owner of the tickets as wallet are associated with physical identities via Zero-Knowledge cryptography.
10. Private events: Ticketland support private events which can be distributed to a close group of attendees defined by the event organizer.
11. Event crowdfunding: Allow smaller entities to crowdfund the organization of their events. Early supporters will be granted an extra sponsorship NFT which like the ordinary NFT will be part of their ticket history.
12. Fast transaction speed: Ticketland is built on top of the Solana blockchain which has a proven record of high transaction throughput which allows this to be comparable in speed with the web2 counterparts.
13. Mobile application for both ticket verifiers and ticket holders. We will allow physical ticket verification at the venues.
14. Online ticket verification widget. For online events we will support plug-n-play widgets which event organizers can add to their website to do the ticket verification.
15. Current solution make the exact opposite from what we're trying to achieve; that is bring the web3 technology to the masses via common web2 UX. All existing technologies introduce native tokens and require the existense of browser or mobile version and having native coins to begin with. We are the exact opposite; we don't expect any user to know anything about web3 technologies.
16. Open participation. Anyone can organize any event an issue tickets or invitation cards (we put this in the same category with tickets). A mom can organize an birthday party and send beautiful NFT tickets to her close friends. This same NFT will be part of a decentralized ticket history of each individual which they can always view.
Tickets are not just passes to events; tickets are memories and memories should stay with us!

hackathonProjects.name: DEBEATS - Make Music NFTs Playable
hackathonProjects.description: DEBEATS is the first decentralized music NFT game built on Solana where you can play, create and earn.
hackathonProjects.additionalInformation:
DEBEATS is the first decentralized music NFT game built on Solana where you can play, create and earn.
DoraHacks Link: https://dorahacks.io/buidl/3278
Website: https://debeats.com/
By connecting music NFT to rhythm games, DEBEATS lets you map out the beats of all music and earn from your own beatmaps, taking music games to Web3.0 by returning ownership to the creators.
1. DEBEATS provides an ever-expanding library of copyrighted songs for music fans, artists, and creators to design maps for. Every beatmap created is an NFT that will be listed in-game, played by others, and generate revenue for its maker.
2. Players can interpret one song in multiple ways, and create multiple beatmaps of different difficulties, which expand user-generated content and increase the game’s playability for other users.
3. DEBEATS supports multiple platforms and is powered by Unreal Engine 4, providing better visual effects and an outstanding gaming experience.
4. DEBEATS uses a creator economy to share revenue with contributors. All artists and beatmap makers receive a share of the beatmap NFT sale and other generated revenue.
How it works
Step 1. Log in with PlayerID and connect your Solana wallet on DEBEATS website
Step 2. Mint a DEBEATS Headphones NFT on Solana
Step 3. Log in to the game app, put on your headphones NFT and begin your DEBEATS journey!
Step 4. After each gameplay, you’ll earn token rewards based on your ranking
Step 5. You can spend tokens to mint and unlock more song and beatmap NFTs in-game.
Step 6. Become a beatmap creator and start making beatmaps for other players to play.
The Creator Economy
DEBEATS uses a creator economy to share revenue with contributors. All artists and beatmap makers receive a share of the initial beatmap NFT sale. Subsequent trading fees generate ongoing revenue, and extra rewards are allocated based on the beatmap play-throughs.
The creator economy can be simplified by breaking it down into three parts:
1. Players can create their own beatmap NFTs for other players to play
2. Beatmaps are tradable; Both the beatmap creator and music creator share revenue generated by the beatmap.
3. Creators’ earnings depend on the performances of the beatmaps.

hackathonProjects.name: ZClub
hackathonProjects.description: ZClub is a Web3 audio chat app that enables users to talk to earn. Users buy a seat NFT to start, and build social connections in the Social-Fi and Game-Fi app.
hackathonProjects.additionalInformation:
What is ZClub?
ZClub is the first ever audio-focused web3 social app that enables users to talk-to-earn and get in-app token rewards from live gifting. All you need to do is to get a SeatNFT and start to chat with your friends in the app, or get a Chatroom NFT to host events or competitions, then you will get revenue share from talk-to-earn and live gifting by being an NFT holder.
What is ZClub Live Gifting?
Similar to Bits on twitch where people can buy such virtual goods to cheer for their favorite streamers, ZClub live gifting operates in the same way. Whenever your ZClub friends go live, you can send them gifts with varying amounts of token value to show your love, support, admiration and friendship.
Users gain both investing and emotional values from ZClub. Investing values refer to ZClub NFT holders who join the community and talk-to-earn; Emotional values mean users make friends and build social bonds with others to gain happiness, friendship, feeling of existence, and even fulfill their egos. Therefore, users are more encouraged to use ZClub when comparing with other X-to-Earn apps, making the ecosystem suitable in the long run.
Our main goals:
Erase threshold, enable profits for all: In traditional platforms, users are the ones pay to play and never get any profits/money back. ZClub erases these cliché standards and redefines users’ role in digital platform and entitles everyone the equal rights to get revenue share from social platforms and live gifting.
Create investing and emotional values for users: Talk-to-earn is the fundamental mechanism of ZClub, bringing investing value to users and enabling them to talk to earn. However, users also gain emotional values in ZClub from making friends, exchanging ideas and engaging with each other, satisfying their desire for happiness, support, social connection and feeling of existence.
Build Social DAO: ZClub aims at building a web3-driven community where participants can exchange ideas in real time and make their voice heard, and even choose the future path of ZClub
Reduce depression and improve mental health: ZClub serves as a bridge for people to communicate, thus help to reduce their feeling of loneliness in the stressful physical world, not to mention during coivd-19 pandemic when lots of people are work from home or under medical quarantine and they feel emptier and more isolated than ever before.
Problems we want to solve:
Revenue share for all: In traditional platforms, such as Youtube or TikTok, content creators are usually required to have at least 10,000 followers before they can receive gifts and get revenue share. People may spend months in just hitting this threshold. However, people can simply get an NFT from open marketplace or rent one from other NFT holders, then they can start to talk-to-earn, and get revuene share from live gifting.
Utility for Live Gifting: With ZClub gamification feature, receiving and sending gifts can enhance NFTs attributes, leading to the increase of NFT token value in the open market for NFT holders. Also, live gifts are dynamic, meaning gift recipients and room hosts can get revenue share from live gifting in real time and motive them to work harder in maintaining interpersonal/social relationship in ZClub community.
Onboarding NFT/Crypto Newbies: when it comes to NFT/crypto related mobile apps, many people might be deterred from exploring the app due to the complexity of setting up exchange account and wallet address. ZClub smart rent/lease system make sure crypto newbies can get start as easy as downloading the app and rent an NFT, maintaining their long-term enthusiasm for the game.
Ownership of digital assets: people cannot verify the ownership of their digital assets in the web2 world, they simply pay for it and naturally assume that they own it. However, the hard truth is that the ownership still belongs to the web2 platform. NFTs revolutionize how asset ownership works. It makes sure that the ownership of NFT holders is authenticated and protected, enabling them to sell their assets as tokens in the open market or buy assets from other owners.
Greater Social Connection: Live gift is an innovative way to express our feelings, and build a stronger connection to that person as well. Not only does the person receiving the gift feel closer to the giver, but vice versa as well. This will help to build a greater social connection.
Why Audio Chat?
On-demand: The popularity of podcast, and clubhouse proves that there is huge demand for audio-focused product
Low entry barrier and easy to use: Unlike video chat which has high requirement for stable internet connections, high internet speed and good-quality camera, Voice chatting is easier to use because of its requirement on bandwidth is not that high, making it easier to use than any other forms of communication.
Social equality: Discrimination is a perpetual topic in the society, whether it is about gender, color, appearance and religion beliefs. Audio chat is an effective way to avoid such prejudice and bias, as people cannot see each other’s physical appearance when chatting in ZClub. It is suitable for anyone, of any gender, color, nationality and religion.
How we built it:
Technological stack
Frontend: React, @solana/web3, @solana/spl-token
Client: Java(android), Swift(iOS)
Backend: Golang (REST API), NodeJs, Postgres, Arweave (IPFS)
Storage: Arweave
Blockchain (smart contracts): Rust(solana), Solidity(bsc and other)
User advantages:
Multi-chain: Zclub is a cross-blockchain platform supporting Solana, BSC, and others.
Gas-free: No gas fees for Creators and Buyers on the selected blockchain in our app.
Low commission: We an in-app marketplace with low commistion fee, only 2% rolyties is taken from each transaction.
Market analysis:
The global social networking app market size was valued at USD 39.7 billion in 2021 and is expected to expand at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 23.4% from 2022 to 2028. This can be credited to the rising demand for 5G technology across the globe. Then, its fair to say that social networking is still a big market waiting to be tap in.
Our competitors:
Axie Infinity: No emotioanl valune, pure ponzi. Users play it only for token earning, leading to the fast drop of MAU and revenue
Stepn: Have some self-centered value, but move-to-earn model drops fastly, now only 30% of its peak revenue. MAUdrops 50% compared with May 2022.
Clubhouse: No business model, no one earns. its MAU is only 5% of its peak in Feb 2021
ZClub: A combination of investment valune and emotional value. A more prifitable and healthier model than other products.

hackathonProjects.name: Disco Protocol
hackathonProjects.description: Disco Protocol offers a suite of tools that decentralize the way events are managed.
hackathonProjects.additionalInformation:
I'm a professional bartender (Cindy) and I have my share of time in the events industry. After learning about the blockchain with my friend who is a Software Engineer (Dayana), many ideas arose in our minds. The events industry might not be DeFi or a P2E but it can surely benefit from new ways. There are huge opportunities, ranging from ticket deals to on-site sales with crypto, including tokenized products, and contactless payment with near-instant settlements. Also, making fraud-resistant tickets by using tokenized ones or NFT ticketing in combination with wallet-based check-in is possible. This is what we’re aiming for.
That’s how Disco Protocol was born. We began in March this same year to build this idea and everything is going pretty well. We think this hackathon can help us get more awareness about what we’re doing and more people that would like to try it on their events!
Therefore, Disco Protocol offers a suite of tools that decentralize the way events are managed. We’re making events funky using Solana. Our platform shows an events board for clients to navigate through events, create new ones, sell tokenized/NFT tickets, and visualize all the info about the event. The protocol enables contactless transactions inside the event that are stored on the Solana blockchain. Also, attendees can easily buy tickets with crypto and use the same accepted mint to make purchases inside the event, they can either connect their wallets on the platform or use Solana Pay. There’s a POS Android Native app that enables check-ins, recharges, and purchases (you can check our demo here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3lKcAJzYzXA ). During the check-in process, we also rely on Solana Pay to look for the attendees’ tickets.
Our program is written using Anchor Framework. Both the program and website are deployed and accessible. And of course, Disco Protocol is Open Source
In case you would like to know more, here you can have more info about our project:
https://medium.com/@DISCO_Protocol/new-solana-protocol-to-bring-the-blockchain-to-real-life-events-disco-protocol-e629e25cf45c
https://medium.com/@DISCO_Protocol/disco-protocol-is-the-easiest-path-for-event-producers-to-start-relying-on-the-blockchain-4cca16755a99
https://medium.com/@DISCO_Protocol/do-you-like-to-party-then-you-need-to-know-about-disco-protocol-511f4b6dd46b

hackathonProjects.name: Garbles
hackathonProjects.description: A composable and non-custodial crypto mobile game, built for non-crypto people
hackathonProjects.additionalInformation: Presentation: https://docsend.com/view/rg5g789sz6xp4g3d. Garbles is a crypto mobile game, easy enough for non-crypto people. There are 2.6B mobile players that still can't access our space, due to the complexity of the tech stack or poor wallet UX. By integrating web3auth in the Solana.Unity SDK (that we have built and published: https://github.com/orgs/garbles-labs/repositories) we achieved composability and self-custody, without the need of a seed phrase or any crypto experience. Players can start collecting trash as NFTs and remove C02 through tokenised carbon credits, used as resources in the game. Any Solana program can be easily integrated to create the a thriving ecosystem of crypto minigames/experiences, accessible to the crypto inexperienced. We have already showcased live our tech and are releasing a private beta to our community (1500) in two weeks. List of team members: Andrea (CEO and Co-Founder) - Crypto native with extensive startups experience (defi protocol which x10 tvl). Gamer. Gabriele (CTO and Co-Founder) - AI researcher with 14 patents in NLP. Unity dev since high school. Stuart (Lead Artist and Co-Founder) - Independent artist. Worked with Fortune 500 companies for big AR projects. Shoutouts to out contributors for this hackathon! Chris - mod , Aman - Wire mini game , Akshat - UI refresh , Aksel - SDK contribution, Mayur - minigame on-chain rewards. And last, just our community members picking up trash <3 https://twitter.com/garblesfun/status/1554932938965504000?s=20&t=Lv-0B4O6On7IKEWjWmzbiw

hackathonProjects.name: Gilder
hackathonProjects.description: A platform for Solana DAO communities.
hackathonProjects.additionalInformation:
Gilder is Platform for Solana DAO’s and their communities
* We are building Gilder because we believe that DAO’s are the future of how internet communities organize. Currently interacting with DAO's and the members of the dao is segmented to those who join discord and through various means prove they are members. There are no crypto native dao communication tools on Solana right now. * That’s why we decided to combine DAO management + chat so that the community can engage directly where proposals and actions are occurring.
* Permissions and access in chat are based upon the users membership in the dao. * Future plans - chat
* Allow members to create opt in channels, creating channels with token amount requirements, directly posting and sharing proposals within chat channels
Android download : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dawggydawg.gilderapp
IOS download: https://testflight.apple.com/join/91SEmqTH
Currently at time of submission I'm waiting on Apple to finish upgrading dev account and cannot update testflight. So IOS device may or may not be able to test chat at the time of judging.

hackathonProjects.name: Metaversium
hackathonProjects.description: Mobile game powered by Solana Mobile Stack: city-building strategy game designed on top of DeFi concepts.
hackathonProjects.additionalInformation:
In this hackathon, we created a mobile game client powered by brand new SMS SDK. In our economic simulation game, players can mint new NFT buildings, stake NFT characters to farm resources, claim and spend fungible tokens to upgrade NFTs or trade with other players in our marketplace that works on top of Serum DEX and is available here: https://metaversium.io/marketplace
Looking forward, we're now starting closed alpha test of the existing MVP, while working on new features such as on-chain PvP and PvE battles, quest system, achievements and more.
